H0.text: One of the longest ruling monarchs of the 20th century and a massive and dangerous volcano in the USA share which name. Victoria

H1.text: One of the longest ruling monarchs of the 20th century and a massive and dangerous volcano in the USA share which name. Elizabeth

H2.text: One of the longest ruling monarchs of the 20th century and a massive and dangerous volcano in the USA share which name. Hirohito

H3.text: One of the longest ruling monarchs of the 20th century and a massive and dangerous volcano in the USA share which name. Rainier

A4.text: At the time of his death, he was the world's second longest-serving living head of state, just below the King of Thailand, Bhumibol Adulyadej, and the longest-reigning monarch in Europe.

A5.text: Rainier ruled the Principality of Monaco for almost 56 years.
